input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories don’t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company 9' Colonial Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Haute Decor Snowfall Creek 6' Pre-Lit Flocked Garland'
  - Name='Sullivans 50"L Christmas Lighted Cluster Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Magnolia Mix Pine Garland with LED Lights and Bows'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 70'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Kurt Adler 18-Inch Pre-Lit Warm White Incandescent Green Garland'
  - Name='SAPESHA 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Whitter Pine Garland with LED Lights'
  - Name='Lowe's 47-Feet White LED Plug-in Christmas String Lights GX235917X'
  - Name='Brite Star Indoor/Outdoor Pre-lit Electrical outlet 36-Feet Pine Artificial Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4’ Christmas Tree with Berries'
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cone Christmas Garland with Warm LED Lights (2-Pack'
  - Name='Sullivans Artificial Alpine Fir Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9' Colonial Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and pre-lit garland from the same brand, likely similar construction and indoor/outdoor use, though the branch type is Colonial rather than Norwood Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor Snowfall Creek 6' Pre-Lit Flocked Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pre-lit garland but shorter (6 feet) and 'flocked' (artificial snow effect), indicating some differences; still similar in purpose and construction.
Much shorter garland (50 inches) described as cluster style with lights; less similar in size, may have different construction and branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Magnolia Mix Pine Garland with LED Lights and Bows
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit, similar pine branch construction but includes bows and magnolia mix, so slightly different composition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 70'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter garland (70 inches), lighted faux pine similar purpose but smaller size and possibly less dense or different branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler 18-Inch Pre-Lit Warm White Incandescent Green Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much shorter length (18 inches) and incandescent lighting rather than LED; likely very different scale and use.
Same length and pre-lit, general Christmas garland likely similar in construction and use, though brand and specific branch types unknown.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Whitter Pine Garland with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit pine garland, similar construction and function though possibly different pine variety or brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lowe's 47-Feet White LED Plug-in Christmas String Lights GX235917X
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is string lights only, not a garland, so it is not relevant to the reference garland product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brite Star Indoor/Outdoor Pre-lit Electrical outlet 36-Feet Pine Artificial Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Longer garland (36 feet) but similarly pre-lit, pine artificial garland suitable for indoor/outdoor use; very similar product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4’ Christmas Tree with Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Christmas tree, not a garland; completely different product category and use.
Artificial fir garland similar in product type and use though length and lighting details not specified; probably similar construction.
